name: Cephalopod Fishing
description:
Swim out into the vast sea, catch some fish and  Cephalopods!

You are the type of person who is always tired. Watch out not to fall asleep when the net is down in the depths of the unknown or you will lose it and make further journey pointless. Make sure not to run the timer down to 0 with the net in the water.

Watch out not to get your reel too hot too! The hotter it gets the slower the net moves up.

Pssst... cephalopods are the most valuable.
